name: Shine Pro Mobile Detailing
serviceArea: Rio Grande City, Roma, Mission, McAllen

hero.headline: Mobile Detailing That Makes Your Car Look Brand New
hero.subheadline: Same-day appointments across the Rio Grande Valley. We come to you — fully equipped.

services.title: Interior Deep Clean
services.description: Steam clean, shampoo, stain treatment, odor removal.

services.title: Exterior Wash & Wax
services.description: Foam wash, clay bar, wax/sealant finish.

services.title: Full Detail
services.description: Interior + exterior complete package for a like-new reset.

testimonials.name: Jordan M.
testimonials.quote: My truck looked better than the day I bought it.

testimonials.name: Alyssa R.
testimonials.quote: Easy booking and on-time service every time.

faq.question: How long does it take?
faq.answer: Most jobs take 2–4 hours depending on vehicle size and condition.

faq.question: Do you bring water and power?

landing.serviceAreaText: Serving Rio Grande City, Roma, Mission, McAllen, and nearby areas with at-home mobile detailing.
